message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a fair price considering its value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $110. It's still a great deal considering the product's value, and I think it's a fair middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $100. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
